welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Iesolo, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our beautiful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Marco Polo Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Marco Polo Airport, primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the VCE-FreeWiFi network and accept the terms and conditions to access.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at S. Angelo Airport, servicing both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at S. Angelo Airport, mainly used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a free option for basic internet access and a paid option for faster speeds.
